Detailed Description

Model object for blacklisted IP addresses.

Blocked IPs are inhibited from accessing the website. The blacklisted status is inflicted to spammers, leechers, bots and other treacherous visitor classes.

Performs specialized initialization tasks.

Subclassers will use this method to perform custom initialization.

Note:
The default implementation simply does nothing.
